LanguageData.PTUpgradeApparelPsychic.label: enhance apparel to be psychically potent
LanguageData.PTUpgradeApparelPsychic.description: Enhances apparel to be psychically potent, improving the psychic abilities of a psion when worn.\n\nEnhanced apparel is less effective at improving the psychic abilities of a psion than specialized psychic apparel.
LanguageData.PTWorkbenchCreateInsanityLance.label: create psychic insanity lance
LanguageData.PTWorkbenchCreateInsanityLance.descripti: Carefully assemble a psychic insanity lance from athenium and plasteel.
LanguageData.PTWorkbenchCreateShockLance.label: create psychic shock lance
LanguageData.PTWorkbenchCreateShockLance.description: Carefully assemble a psychic shock lance from athenium and plasteel.
LanguageData.PTWorkbenchCreateAnimalPulser.label: create psychic animal pulser
LanguageData.PTWorkbenchCreateAnimalPulser.descriptio: Carefully assemble a psychic animal pulser from athenium and plasteel.
LanguageData.PTWorkbenchCreateSoothePulser.label: create psychic soothe pulser
LanguageData.PTWorkbenchCreateSoothePulser.descriptio: Carefully assemble a psychic soothe pulser from athenium and plasteel.
LanguageData.PTMachiningExtractAtheniumFromPsychicArt: extract athenium from a psychic artifact
Carefully disassemble a psychic artifact and extract the athenium contained within.
Extracting athenium from a psychic artifact.
LanguageData.PTWorkbenchExtractAtheniumFromPsychicArt: extract athenium from a psychic artifact
Carefully disassemble a psychic artifact and extract the athenium contained within.
Extracting athenium from a psychic artifact.
LanguageData.PTWorkbenchCreateAthenium.label: create athenium
LanguageData.PTWorkbenchCreateAthenium.description: Create athenium from simpler materials. Only a psion trained in psi forging can create athenium.
LanguageData.PTWorkbenchCreatePsychicFoil.label: create psychic foil helmet
LanguageData.PTWorkbenchCreatePsychicFoil.description: Carefully assemble a psychic foil helmet from athenium and steel.\n\nAs it turns out, psychic foil helmets block psychic waves due to the presence of misaligned athenium crystal structures. With some athenium and steel, it's easy to create such helmets.
LanguageData.PTWorkbenchCreateAdvancedPsychicFoil.lab: create an advanced psychic foil helmet
LanguageData.PTWorkbenchCreateAdvancedPsychicFoil.des: Carefully assemble an advanced psychic foil helmet from athenium and steel.\n\nImproving upon the design of the basic psychic foil helmet, the advanced psychic foil helmet uses multilayered, highly optimized misaligned athenium crystal structures to insulate the wearer from most psychic waves.
LanguageData.PTWorkbenchCreateAdvancedPsychicFoil.job: Creating an advanced psychic foil helmet.
LanguageData.PTUpgradeWeaponPsychic.label: upgrade a weapon to be psychically active
LanguageData.PTUpgradeWeaponPsychic.description: Upgrades a weapon to be psychically active, improving its performance when used by a properly trained psion.
